metadata.title: Vent Invertebrates Collected at Gorda Ridge

creators.name: Museum, Janet R. Voight of The Field

metadata.description: The Field Museum's Vent Invertebrates Collection Database provides data on specimens collected at Gorda Ridge by Janet R. Voight during the 2002 cruise.  Cruise details are as follows:  R/V Western Flyer with the Remote Vehicle Tiburon, partially funded by NURP Grants POFP005001/AK-99-13 and PO FP206164/CA-02-04 to Zierenberg and McClain UC Davis and by the Monterey Bay Aquarium Research Institute (MBARI). Vent Fields: Escanaba Trough and GR-14.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To give potential users of our collection advance information about material available by loan or for on-site study.

Status: Complete

Maintenance frequency: None Planned

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
